createTenorAndRateSpreadReq
func:
const PAYLATER_URL = env.get('PAYLATER_URL')
const BANK_PRODUCT_KEY = env.get('BANK_PRODUCT_KEY')

msg.vcl = msg.payload

msg.url = `${PAYLATER_URL}/v1/loan-terms`
msg.method = "POST"
msg.payload = {
    "loanProductID": "BNPL",
    "bankID": msg.bankId,
    "loanID": msg.loanId,
    "fromDuration": "P1Y2M3DT4H5M6S",
    "toDuration": "P1Y2M3DT4H5M6S",
    "benchmarkRateID": msg.benchmark,//"b7802e04-2416-4365-ab07-44ac283d1b8a",
    "bankSpread": "",
    "variableSpread": msg.vcl.rateOfInterest,
    "actyvSpread": 1,
    "additionalCashbackCodes": [
        "UYUS",
        "CSY+23"
    ],
    "bankMaxAllowedRate": 9.008,
    "doesActyvSpreadBreachThreshold": false,
    "actyvSpreadExceedingThreshold": 1.234,
    "validFrom": "2022-11-31 00:00:00.000000+00",
    "ValidTill": "2024-11-31 00:00:00.000000+00"
}

return msg;

func:
const GO_URL = env.get('GO_URL')

const businessPartnerId = flow.get('businessPartnerId') || ""

flow.set('bankProductConfigId', msg.payload.id)
const bankId = msg.payload.bank
msg.bankId = bankId
msg.enterpriseId = msg.payload.allowedEnterprises[0]

msg.url = `${GO_URL}/bank-application?bankID=${bankId}&businessPartner=${businessPartnerId}&bankProductConfigKey=${msg.payload.id}`
console.log("URL",msg.url)
msg.method = 'GET'

return msg;

name: setFlowVariable
Set env variables
func:
const ENV_VARIABLES = new Map();

ENV_VARIABLES.set('PAYLATER_URL', env.get("PAYLATER_URL"))
ENV_VARIABLES.set('GO_URL', env.get("GO_URL"))
ENV_VARIABLES.set('ADMIN_URL', env.get("ADMIN_URL"))

ENV_VARIABLES.set('BUSINESS_IDENTIFIER', env.get("BUSINESS_IDENTIFIER"))
ENV_VARIABLES.set('BUSINESS_TYPE', env.get("BUSINESS_TYPE"))
ENV_VARIABLES.set('BANK_KEY', env.get("BANK_KEY"))
ENV_VARIABLES.set('BANK_PRODUCT_KEY', env.get("BANK_PRODUCT_KEY"))
ENV_VARIABLES.set('X_ACTYV_API_CONFIG_KEY', env.get("X_ACTYV_API_CONFIG_KEY"))
ENV_VARIABLES.set('EMAIL', env.get("EMAIL"))
ENV_VARIABLES.set('PASSWORD', env.get("PASSWORD"))
ENV_VARIABLES.set('CONFIG_KEY', env.get("CONFIG_KEY"))
ENV_VARIABLES.set('BANK_UNIQUE_IDENTIFIER', env.get("BANK_UNIQUE_IDENTIFIER"))

global.set('envVariables',ENV_VARIABLES)

return msg;

func:
const fileName = global.get('filename') // filename with extension

msg.failurePath = `${env.get("SFTP_FAILURE_FOLDER")}`
msg.localPath = `${env.get("LOCAL_PATH")}/${fileName}`
msg.remotePath = `${env.get("REMOTE_PATH_OUT")}/${fileName}`

return msg;
